Document.name: EndsWith
Document.summary: Test is the postfix of the text equivalence to the provided sub string.
Document.returns: Returns true if the postfix of the text equivalence to the provided sub string.
Document.param: The text to test the postfix.
Flags controlling how to normalize a string.
Document.remarks: For any normalization that is not None, the postfix could be different to the string you want to find.
